panel.title: Blended Ingest Range across all hosts

search.query: index=_introspection "data.writes_ps"="*" component=IOstats data.cpu_pct<$workload$ | stats perc80(data.writes_kb_ps) AS wps perc80(data.reads_kb_ps) AS rps by host, _time | eval extrap_writes_daily_gb=((wps)*1440)/1024/1024 | eval extrap_reads_daily_gb=((rps)*1440)/1024/1024 | eval extrap_total_volume=extrap_writes_daily_gb+extrap_reads_daily_gb | stats perc50(extrap_total_volume) AS 50%idxGBScore perc60(extrap_total_volume) AS 60%idxGBScore perc70(extrap_total_volume) AS 70%idxGBScore perc80(extrap_total_volume) AS 80%idxGBScore perc90(extrap_total_volume) AS 90%idxGBScore
